Dear {{contact.First_Name__c}} {{contact.Last_Name__c}},

Information Sessions are delivered by volunteer Dementia Friends Champions and may, unfortunately, need to be cancelled due to unforeseen circumstances. To find an alternative Session, visit our website.
Best wishes,
